Noiseless fireworks but pretty lights
Is a safety solution

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petitions open on the topic of fireworks which you might like to sign:

Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

Require a licence to buy or release any fireworks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626683

Reduce the decibel limit on fireworks to 85 decibels, to reduce impact
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622900

Ban use of fireworks by the public after 11pm, and organised displays after 1am
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626726

Introduce new restrictions on the purchase and release of fireworks
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625571

Ban all fireworks permanently, including displays.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626850

Prevent the sale of Fireworks until the week of Bonfire Night and New Years
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626600

Restrict the sale and use of fireworks by the public to certain celebration days
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626787
